languages.text: {n}Потусторонняя какофония, все это время казавшаяся громом далеких пушек, вдруг обрушивается на вас со всей мощью — энергии варпа, сочащиеся словно из самого воздуха, врываются в ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}разверстый разум{/d} словно неукротимая волна смрада и нечистот. На мгновение вам кажется, что ваша голова лопнет... и вдруг наваждение откатывается, оставляя вместо себя иное ощущение — прикосновение к вашим вискам.{/n}

{n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Потусторонняя какофония, все это время казавшаяся громом далеких пушек, вдруг обрушивается на вас со всей мощью — энергии варпа, сочащиеся словно из самого воздуха, врываются в ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}разверстый разум{/d} словно неукротимая волна смрада и нечистот. На мгновение вам кажется, что ваша голова лопнет... и вдруг наваждение откатывается, оставляя вместо себя иное ощущение — прикосновение к вашим вискам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly crashes into you with all its intensity — the warp energies are seemingly bursting out of thin air and rushing inside your exposed mind like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving behind a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

{n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly crashes into you with all its intensity — the warp energies are seemingly bursting out of thin air and rushing inside your exposed mind like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving behind a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

{n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your exposed mind like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine außerweltliche Kakofonie, die bislang nur dem Rumpeln entfernter Kanonen ähnelte, verschlingt dich plötzlich mit voller Intensität – die Warpenergien scheinen aus dem Nichts hervorzuplatzen und schießen in deinen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}geöffneten Geist{/d} wie eine unaufhaltsame Schmutzwelle. Für einen Augenblick fühlt es sich an, als würde dein Kopf explodieren ... aber dann wird der Eindruck schwächer und hinterlässt einen anderen – den einer Berührung deiner Schläfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine außerweltliche Kakofonie, die bislang nur dem Rumpeln entfernter Kanonen ähnelte, verschlingt dich plötzlich mit voller Intensität – die Warpenergien scheinen aus dem Nichts hervorzuplatzen und schießen in deinen geöffneten Geist wie eine unaufhaltsame Schmutzwelle. Für einen Augenblick fühlt es sich an, als würde dein Kopf explodieren ... aber dann wird der Eindruck schwächer und hinterlässt einen anderen – den einer Berührung deiner Schläfen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une cacophonie surnaturelle, qui ressemblait jusqu'à présent au grondement de canons lointains, vous enveloppe soudain de toute son intensité. Les énergies du Warp semblent jaillir de nulle part et s'infiltrent à l'intérieur de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}esprit{/d} comme une vague de corruption implacable. Pendant quelques instants, vous avez l'impression que votre tête va exploser... puis la sensation disparaît, remplacée par une autre : celle du contact de deux mains sur vos tempes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une cacophonie surnaturelle, qui ressemblait jusqu'à présent au grondement de canons lointains, vous enveloppe soudain de toute son intensité. Les énergies du Warp semblent jaillir de nulle part et s'infiltrent à l'intérieur de votre esprit comme une vague de corruption implacable. Pendant quelques instants, vous avez l'impression que votre tête va exploser... puis la sensation disparaît, remplacée par une autre : celle du contact de deux mains sur vos tempes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}此时此刻，来自另一个世界的嘈杂声仿佛远处传来的炮声一样，它的声音突然将你完全吞没。亚空间的能量仿佛凭空迸发一般，如同一股势不可挡的污秽之潮，猛烈地冲击着你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}暴露在外的意识{/d}。有那么一瞬间，你感觉自己的头像是要爆炸一样……但随后，这种感觉很快消失了，残留的是另一种感觉——有什么人在按着你的太阳穴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}此时此刻，来自另一个世界的嘈杂声仿佛远处传来的炮声一样，它的声音突然将你完全吞没。亚空间的能量仿佛凭空迸发一般，如同一股势不可挡的污秽之潮，猛烈地冲击着你暴露在外的大脑。有那么一瞬间，你感觉自己的头像是要爆炸一样……但随后，这种感觉很快消失了，残留的是另一种感觉——有什么人在按着你的太阳穴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}遠方のキャノンの音にも似た異界のカコフォニーが、突然あなたを飲み込む<歪み>のエネルギーはどこからともなく溢れ、止めどない不浄の波のごとく{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}無防備な精神{/d}に入り込む。しばらく頭が爆発するかのような感覚が続く…だが、その感覚は去り、違うものが残る…神殿で接触した何者かのものだ。 {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遠方のキャノンの音にも似た異界のカコフォニーが、突然あなたを飲み込むーー<歪み>のエネルギーはどこからともなく溢れ、止めどない不浄の波のごとく無防備な精神に入り込む。しばらく頭が爆発するかのような感覚が続く…だが、その感覚は去り、違うものが残るーー神殿で接触した何者かのものだ。 {/n}

languages.text: {n}De repente, escuchas una fuerte cacofonía sobrenatural que hasta ahora parecía el retumbar de cañones lejanos: energías disformes incontenibles que parecen surgir de la nada, penetrando en tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}mente expuesta{/d} como una corriente imparable de impureza. Durante un momento, sientes que te va a estallar la cabeza... pero la sensación desaparece al rato, y notas algo diferente, como si alguien te tocara la sien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, escuchas una fuerte cacofonía sobrenatural que hasta ahora parecía el retumbar de cañones lejanos: energías disformes incontenibles que parecen surgir de la nada, penetrando en tu mente expuesta como una corriente imparable de impureza. Durante un momento, sientes que te va a estallar la cabeza... pero la sensación desaparece al rato, y notas algo diferente, como si alguien te tocara la sien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uzaktan gelen top atışlarını anımsatan uhrevi gürültü, aniden tam şiddetiyle seni yutuyor. Öteboyut enerjileri ortaya çıkıp durdurulamaz bir pislik dalgasıymışçasına, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}savunmasız zihnine{/d} hücum ediyor. O an sanki kafan patlayacakmış gibi geliyor... Derken yerini bambaşka bir hisse bırakıyor. Şakaklarına değen parmakları hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An otherworldly cacophony, which until now resembled the rumbling of distant cannons, suddenly swallows you with its full intensity — the warp energies seemingly bursting out of thin air, rushing inside your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}exposed mind{/d} like an unstoppable wave of filth. For a moment it feels like your head might explode... but then the sensation retreats, leaving in its wake a different one — that of someone's touch on your temples.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzaktan gelen top seslerini anımsatan olağan dışı gürültü, aniden tam şiddetiyle seni kuşatıyor. Öteboyut enerjileri ortaya çıkıp savunmasız zihnine tiksindirici bir dalgaymışçasına hücum ediyor. Bir anlığına başın ikiye ayrılacakmış gibi hissediyorsun. Ardından ansızın bu duygu hafifliyor, bu sefer de birisi elleriyle şakaklarını ovalıyormuş gibi bir hissiyat tetikleniyor.{/n}

{n}Uzaktan gelen top atışlarını anımsatan uhrevi gürültü, aniden tam şiddetiyle seni yutuyor. Öteboyut enerjileri ortaya çıkıp durdurulamaz bir pislik dalgasıymışçasına, savunmasız zihnine hücum ediyor. O an sanki kafan patlayacakmış gibi geliyor... Derken yerini bambaşka bir hisse bırakıyor. Şakaklarına değen parmakları hissediyorsun.{/n}
